__e: I'm never convinced that surprises are all they're cracked up to be.
Hello, sugar. I am so sorry I didn't call, but surprises are fun, right?
All that stuff you said to me about life and purpose and stuff... you think maybe surprises are good sometimes?
And there are never really any surprises, and it never really--
Yeah, he's full of surprises and always there when you need him.
John, I know he don't like surprises, and if he's wanting to see somebody, he'll find them.
I just... I feel like there aren't a lot of surprises for me down the road.
And you have no more surprises for your wife.
I'm sure I'm not ruining any surprises at this point, but how was your party?
Oh, I think we still have a few surprises that you don't know about.
Everybody, I've got a few surprises for you.
Well, look, I've had enough surprises for one night.
It's just, I'm not big on surprises.
You know I don't like surprises, but how much further?
You commit to something deeper. You let the little surprises slide.
